xml.data:
Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 2 Kusalattika » 2.1 Paṭiccavāra » 2.1.4 Paccayapaccanīyānuloma » Nasampayuttaduka
Tika
Kusalattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīyānuloma
Nasampayuttaduka
Tika
391Nasampayuttapaccayā nahetupaccayā sahajāte ekaṃ, aññamaññe ekaṃ, nissaye ekaṃ, kamme ekaṃ, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre ekaṃ, indriye ekaṃ, jhāne ekaṃ, vippayutte ekaṃ, atthiyā ekaṃ, avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
<< Nasampayuttadukaup Navippayuttaduka >>
